Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the use of profits from commissaries or canteens in county correctional facilities
Summary: Allows county correctional facilities to use the profits from commissaries or canteens within the facilities for the general purposes of the institution.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the use of profits from commissaries or canteens in county correctional facilities
